Brush your pet's fur regularly to prevent matting and reduce shedding.
Bathe your pet as needed, using appropriate pet shampoo to keep their coat clean.
Trim your pet's nails regularly to prevent overgrowth and discomfort.
Check your pet's ears for dirt buildup, cleaning them gently with a vet-recommended solution.
Brush your pet's teeth regularly to maintain oral health and prevent dental issues.
Provide a balanced diet suitable for your pet's age, size, and health needs.
Ensure your pet has access to fresh water at all times.
